paragraph.paragraph: Applications and libraries created using EiffelEnvision will require the Eiffel Software runtime to be distributed with the application and/or libraries. The Eiffel runtime, EiffelSoftware.Runtime.dll, presence is imperative to the execution of any application created in EiffelEnvision and so must be included when deploying applications.

For ease of distribution, you should include eeredist.msm in any ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vbconwhichtypeofdeploymentproject.htmsetup and deployment project created deploy_setup.xmlinside or deploy_no_setup.xmloutside of Visual Studio .NET. It is not essential to include eeredist.msm in any deployment package, however excluding it will require you to add EiffelSoftware.Runtime.dll, from your projects bin\configuration_name folder, where configuration_name is the name of the configuration.
paragraph.tip: Tip: If you chose to use one of the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vbconwhichtypeofdeploymentproject.htmsetup and deployment projects,eeredist.msm will be included automatically for you as a dependency.
